text: (In mehmaano ka aana tha ke) uski qaum ke log bay-ikhtiyar uske ghar ki taraf daud padey. Pehle se woh aisi hi badkariyon ke khugar thay. Lut ne unse kaha “bhaiyon, yeh meri betiyan maujood hain, yeh tumhare liye pakeeza-tarr hain. Kuch khuda ka khauf karo aur mere mehmano ke mamle mein mujhey zaleel na karo. Kya tum mein koi bhala aadmi nahin?”
